abstract: When it came to his bid for the Golden State Warriors, it seems that Oracle the chief, Larry Ellison, was a day late, if not a dollar short, after the owner of the N.B.A. team announced a deal on Thursday to sell the franchise for a record $450 million to Joe Lacob and Peter Guber.

lead_paragraph: When it came to his bid for the Golden State Warriors, it seems that the Oracle chief, Larry Ellison, was a day late, if not a dollar short.

headline.main: Ellison Beat Out in Record Warriors Sale
